title: MG Motor Latam
info: MG Motor Latam site conceptualization, and front-end development, this site is replicated in all Latin America region.

title: Samsung Chile Liveshop
info: A web app live shopping, a new sale concept with a live transmission where users can interact with salesman in real time.

title: RLC Store

title: Pharpack Website

title: MG Challenge

title: Audiovisual Landing Page
info: A concept landing page, exploring the color and form combination to attract user to interact with the optimized UI, designed to catch rapidly a conversion for the client.
